subject: Revisions required before final approval
body: After reviewing the latest build of Project Phoenix, we need additional changes to the payment flow. This may impact the planned beta launch timeline.

subject: Urgent: API stability concerns
body: We’ve received multiple reports about intermittent API failures in staging. Please prioritize investigating this before Friday.

subject: Landing page readiness for campaign
body: Can you confirm if the Website Redesign landing page will be ready by Friday? Campaign launch depends on it.

subject: Performance concerns on dashboard prototype
body: Overall progress looks good, but performance feels slower than expected. We’re concerned this could impact user adoption.

subject: Budget implications of scope expansion
body: The recent scope additions in Project Phoenix may exceed the allocated budget. Please review and confirm.

subject: Blocking issue found in payment integration
body: During testing, we identified a blocking issue in the payment API integration. Users are unable to complete transactions.

subject: Additional design revisions
body: We have a few more design changes for the Website Redesign. Please see attached mockups.

subject: Server load increasing in staging
body: We are seeing increased server load in staging over the last 48 hours. This could affect performance testing.

subject: Deadline reminder for Beta Launch
body: Reminder that the Beta Launch milestone for Project Phoenix is scheduled for February 22. Please confirm readiness.

subject: Team workload feedback
body: We’ve received informal feedback that the backend team feels overloaded this sprint due to multiple urgent tasks.
